Everything about  bomb disposal  Americans  know  today how to deal with  sea mines  parachute land mines various Fuse anti handling  fues    booby traps  time delay Fused  bombs mercury switches   butterfly bombs  came directly from the British  during WW2 fighting the most sophisticated enemy of the war  the germans during the London Blitz  when Britain was subjected to constant day then night German bombers  early in the war the British knew next to nothing about bombs   booby's Fuses  anti handling  device's the British learned the hard way  sometimes costing the life  of a unselfish brave soul  who  volunteer  who walked alone in to the unknown whether he was going to survive or blown to kingdom come   to attempt to make safe a enemy bomb   either a 500 IB to a 1800 lb German Satan bombs     from  WW2    to   northern Ireland  car bombs  I.E.D  are not  new  they have been around since WW2 chemical bombs  all the tricks  solutions specialist equipment  employed  was because of the British experience   passed on to the cousins across the pond
